overview:
Lou Pelosi is an independent business development and marketing consultant and advisor for early-stage software-as-a-service (SaaS) companies. He is also a board member of the East Palo Alto Kids Foundation (EPAK).

Lou has been a significant contributor to successful company exits ($1 Billion+ IPO, 2 acquisitions, 2 venture fundings) and has broad experiences working for large ($1B+ revenues) and small (pre-revenue) companies leading product marketing, marketing communications, customer success, channels and business development.

degrees.institution: University of California, Berkeley - Walter A. Haas School of Business
